entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
